item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST & BEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."
OFTEN COPIED, NEVER DUPLICATED.

SATURDAY, DECEMBER 5, at the HILTON GARDEN INN, 420 Totten Pond Rd., Waltham. Exit 27A off Rte. 128. (781)890-0100.
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres 9-10, free door prizes. Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
Free door prizes, raffles, and MATCH GAME prizes.
www.se-4u.com.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES, 35-60 years old.
Cost is $12 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress required…sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Info, call (781)446-0234.

DONATION OF UNWRAPPED GIFTS FOR "TOYS FOR TOTS" APPRECIATED.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" CHRISTMAS DANCE
